vote.motion-ch: FCR(2020-21)53 開立新承擔額1億3,377萬元，用以就實施貿易單一窗口系統第二階段建立所需的資訊科技系統
vote.motion-en: FCR(2020-21)53 A new commitment of $133,770,000 for setting up the information technology system required for the implementation of Phase 2 of the Trade Single Window System

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2020-21)70 －PWSC(2019-20)14 工務小組委員會在2019年11月13日所提出的建議－(a)在沙田石門安興里興建骨灰安置所、紀念花園設施和相關工程；及(b)興建行人隧道以配合沙田石門安興里骨灰安置所計劃
vote.motion-en: FCR(2020-21)70 －PWSC(2019-20)14 RECOMMENDATION OF THE PUBLIC WORKS SUBCOMMITTEE MADE ON 13 NOVEMBER 2019 – (a) Provision of columbarium, Garden of Remembrance and related works at On Hing Lane, Shek Mun, Sha Tin, and (b) construction of subway in support of the provision of columbarium at On Hing Lane, Shek Mun, Sha Tin

vote.motion-ch: 動議中止議程文件FCR(2020-21)54的討論
vote.motion-en: Motion that discussion on FCR(2020-21)54 be now adjourned

vote.motion-ch: 本委員會同意處理委員根據《財務委員會會議程序》第37A段擬動議的議案
vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 37A of the Finance Committee Procedure

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2020-21)54 開立新承擔額54,229,000元，用以更換水警中央指揮系統及其七個光電感應器，以及購置兩個新的光電感應器
vote.motion-en: FCR(2020-21)54 A new commitment of $54,229,000 for the replacement of the Marine Police Central Command System and its seven Electro-Optical Sensors as well as the procurement of two new Electro-Optical Sensors

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2019-20)19A 開立新承擔額5,500萬元，用以設立空氣污染物立體監測網絡
vote.motion-en: FCR(2019-20)19A A new commitment of $55 million for the provision of a three-dimensional air pollution monitoring network
